Interface PizzaPlan

All Known Implementing Classes:
Pizza
public interface PizzaPlan
This is the interface that is accessed by a pizza builder to set the attributes for a Pizza object

  • Method Details

    • setPizzaSize

      void setPizzaSize(String pizzaSize)
      Sets the pizza size
      Parameters:
      pizzaSize - desired size of pizza (small, medium, large)

    • setCrustStyle

      void setCrustStyle(String crustStyle)
      Sets the style of the pizza crust
      Parameters:
      crustStyle - desired crust style (thin, original, pan)

    • setCheeseType

      void setCheeseType(String cheeseType)
      Sets the type of cheese for the pizza
      Parameters:
      cheeseType - desired cheese type (mozzarella, cheddar, swiss)

    • setCheeseAmount

      void setCheeseAmount(String cheeseAmount)
      Sets the amount of cheese for the pizza
      Parameters:
      cheeseAmount - desired cheese amount (easy, original, extra)

    • setToppings

      void setToppings(String[] toppings)
      Sets the toppings for the pizza
      Parameters:
      toppings - list of desired toppings
